title: Same issue as a past post (1 month old, wasn't sure if I should post in it or not)

embed.description: Hey. As I am aware the club system has been resolved however I am still unable to access the club I founded. All the members are able to access it now although I still can't. Would like some help to resolve this! Club tag is "Ebon". Thanks

body: Sorry for making a new post, the only one I could find was a month old. I'm the leader of "Friends from Far Away" club tag "DsTNT". According to my clubmates, it shows me still as the leader, but I don't see my tag and I don't see the club listed. Help please!

replies.body:
We can assist you with resolving this issue if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with this same info (Club name + tag).

Let me know if you have any questions.
